Unacceptable Behaviour

Unacceptable Behaviour Policy

Our practice is committed to providing a safe and respectful environment for our patients and staff. We have a zero-tolerance policy towards any form of harassment, aggression, or abusive behaviour.

Unacceptable behaviour includes, but is not limited to:

  • Verbal abuse, including shouting, swearing, or making threats.
  • Aggressive or violent behaviour.
  • Intimidation or harassment.
  • Discrimination of any kind.

Any individual exhibiting such behaviour may be asked to leave the premises and may be removed from the practice list. We appreciate your cooperation in helping us maintain a positive and safe environment for everyone.
